issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
euca-describe-addresses does not pass filter parameters to the service:

{code}
# euca-describe-addresses --filter domain=vpc --debug
2013-06-21 16:10:27,299 DEBUG   DescribeAddresses parsed arguments: {'userregion': None, 'filters': [('domain', 'vpc')], 'url': None, 'shell_configfile': '', 'deprecated_sec_key': None, 'deprecated_key_id': None, 'show_empty_fields': False, 'address': [], 'key_id': None, 'secret_key': None}
2013-06-21 16:10:27,299 DEBUG   Config searching regions for option 'ec2-url'
2013-06-21 16:10:27,300 DEBUG   Config   section 'aws:us-east-1'
2013-06-21 16:10:27,300 INFO    Config option 'ec2-url' = 'https://ec2.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/'
2013-06-21 16:10:27,300 DEBUG   Config searching regions for option 'verify-ssl'
2013-06-21 16:10:27,300 DEBUG   Config   section 'aws:us-east-1'
2013-06-21 16:10:27,300 DEBUG   Config   section 'aws:*'
2013-06-21 16:10:27,300 INFO    Config option 'verify-ssl' = 'true'
2013-06-21 16:10:27,303 INFO    DescribeAddresses parameters: {'Action': 'DescribeAddresses', 'Version': '2013-02-01'}
2013-06-21 16:10:27,304 INFO    Eucalyptus sending request (attempt 1 of 3)

2013-06-21 16:10:27,305 DEBUG   EC2CompatibleQuerySigV2Auth b64-encoded signature: XnaYMK7xfb5js+XEzKa4TqYgw6gBMng8fjmEqC25ncA=
2013-06-21 16:10:27,306 DEBUG   EC2CompatibleQuerySigV2Auth converting params to POST data
2013-06-21 16:10:27,314 DEBUG   Eucalyptus request method: POST
2013-06-21 16:10:27,314 DEBUG   Eucalyptus request url:    http://10.111.1.13:8773/services/Eucalyptus
2013-06-21 16:10:27,314 DEBUG   Eucalyptus request header: Content-Length: 220
2013-06-21 16:10:27,314 DEBUG   Eucalyptus request header: Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded
2013-06-21 16:10:27,314 DEBUG   Eucalyptus request header: Host: 10.111.1.13:8773
2013-06-21 16:10:27,314 DEBUG   Eucalyptus request header: User-Agent: euca2ools/3.0.0 (CPython 2.6.6; Linux 2.6.32-358.6.2.el6.x86_64; x86_64) requestbuilder/0.1.0-beta2 requests/1.1.0
2013-06-21 16:10:27,314 DEBUG   Eucalyptus request data:   AWSAccessKeyId: RKUZRA4UL4NAA0PLEHND2
2013-06-21 16:10:27,314 DEBUG   Eucalyptus request data:   Action: DescribeAddresses
2013-06-21 16:10:27,314 DEBUG   Eucalyptus request data:   Signature: XnaYMK7xfb5js+XEzKa4TqYgw6gBMng8fjmEqC25ncA=
2013-06-21 16:10:27,315 DEBUG   Eucalyptus request data:   SignatureMethod: HmacSHA256
2013-06-21 16:10:27,315 DEBUG   Eucalyptus request data:   SignatureVersion: 2
2013-06-21 16:10:27,315 DEBUG   Eucalyptus request data:   Timestamp: 2013-06-21T23:10:27Z

2013-06-21 16:10:27,362 DEBUG   Eucalyptus response time: 0.047 seconds

<DescribeAddressesResponse xmlns="http://ec2.amazonaws.com/doc/2013-02-01/"><addressesSet><item><publicIp>10.111.101.10</publicIp></item></addressesSet></DescribeAddressesResponse>
2013-06-21 16:10:27,363 DEBUG   DescribeAddresses -- end of response content --
ADDRESS	10.111.101.10		standard

fields.summary: euca-describe-addresses does not pass filter parameters

comments.body:
Fixed in 65eabbe:

{noformat}
% euca-describe-addresses --filter domain=vpc                                
2013-07-05 13:59:15,719 DEBUG   DescribeAddresses parsed arguments: {'userregion': None, 'filters': [('domain', 'vpc')], 'url': None, 'shell_configfile': '', 'deprecated_sec_key': None, 'deprecated_key_id': None, 'show_empty_fields': False, 'address': [], 'key_id': None, 'secret_key': None}
2013-07-05 13:59:15,728 INFO    DescribeAddresses parameters: {'Action': 'DescribeAddresses', 'Filter.1.Value.1': 'vpc', 'Version': '2013-02-01', 'Filter.1.Name': 'domain'}
2013-07-05 13:59:15,728 INFO    Eucalyptus sending request (attempt 1 of 3)
2013-07-05 13:59:15,729 DEBUG   EC2CompatibleQuerySigV2Auth string to sign: u'POST\nec2.us-west-1.amazonaws.com\n/\nAWSAccessKeyId=AKIAIA3RSTHR2Q4WMPDQ&Action=DescribeAddresses&Filter.1.Name=domain&Filter.1.Value.1=vpc&SignatureMethod=HmacSHA256&SignatureVersion=2&Timestamp=2013-07-05T20%3A59%3A15Z&Version=2013-02-01'

2013-07-05 13:59:15,738 DEBUG   Eucalyptus request method: POST
2013-07-05 13:59:15,738 DEBUG   Eucalyptus request url:    https://ec2.us-west-1.amazonaws.com/
2013-07-05 13:59:15,738 DEBUG   Eucalyptus request header: Content-Length: 261
2013-07-05 13:59:15,739 DEBUG   Eucalyptus request header: Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded
2013-07-05 13:59:15,739 DEBUG   Eucalyptus request header: Host: ec2.us-west-1.amazonaws.com
2013-07-05 13:59:15,739 DEBUG   Eucalyptus request header: User-Agent: euca2ools/3.0.0-rc1 (CPython 2.7.3; Linux 3.9.6-200.fc18.x86_64; x86_64) requestbuilder/0.1.0-beta2 requests/1.1.0
2013-07-05 13:59:15,739 DEBUG   Eucalyptus request data:   AWSAccessKeyId: AKIAIA3RSTHR2Q4WMPDQ
2013-07-05 13:59:15,739 DEBUG   Eucalyptus request data:   Action: DescribeAddresses
2013-07-05 13:59:15,739 DEBUG   Eucalyptus request data:   Filter.1.Name: domain
2013-07-05 13:59:15,739 DEBUG   Eucalyptus request data:   Filter.1.Value.1: vpc
2013-07-05 13:59:15,740 DEBUG   Eucalyptus request data:   Signature: p979auZEICkFdMLv+xgSOaMiIj19dld9SGoSsOKBSWk=
2013-07-05 13:59:15,740 DEBUG   Eucalyptus request data:   SignatureMethod: HmacSHA256
2013-07-05 13:59:15,740 DEBUG   Eucalyptus request data:   SignatureVersion: 2
2013-07-05 13:59:15,740 DEBUG   Eucalyptus request data:   Timestamp: 2013-07-05T20:59:15Z
2013-07-05 13:59:15,740 DEBUG   Eucalyptus request data:   Version: 2013-02-01
2013-07-05 13:59:16,179 DEBUG   Eucalyptus response time: 0.438 seconds
2013-07-05 13:59:16,179 INFO    Eucalyptus response status: 200
2013-07-05 13:59:16,179 DEBUG   Eucalyptus response header: content-type: text/xml;charset=UTF-8
2013-07-05 13:59:16,179 DEBUG   Eucalyptus response header: date: Fri, 05 Jul 2013 20:59:15 GMT
2013-07-05 13:59:16,179 DEBUG   Eucalyptus response header: server: AmazonEC2
2013-07-05 13:59:16,180 DEBUG   Eucalyptus response header: transfer-encoding: chunked
2013-07-05 13:59:16,180 DEBUG   DescribeAddresses -- response content --
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<DescribeAddressesResponse xmlns="http://ec2.amazonaws.com/doc/2013-02-01/">
    <requestId>4ef15c7d-c2cf-4348-94d1-dab15c93d062</requestId>
    <addressesSet/>
</DescribeAddressesResponse>
{noformat}

Fix verified describe addresses correctly passes filters

Installed Packages
Name        : euca2ools
Arch        : noarch
Version     : 3.0.1
Release     : 0.0.104.el6

{code}
